Processor

class celltk.process.Processor(output='process', **kwargs)
align_by_cross_correlation(image=(), mask=(), track=(), align_with='image', crop=True)

Shifts and crops images based on regi.phase_cross_correlation.

Return type

NewType()(same, ndarray)

Multidimensional Gaussian filter.

Return type

NewType()(image, ndarray)

Multidimensional Laplace filter using Gaussian second derivatives.

Return type

Return type

inverse_gaussian_gradient(image, alpha=100.0, sigma=5.0)
Return type

NewType()(image, ndarray)

make_edge_potential_image(image, method='sigmoid', alpha=None, beta=None, k1=None, k2=None)

method = sigmoid, exp, reciprocal

K1 is the minimum value along the contour K2 is the avg value inside the countour K1 should be > K2

alpha should be (K2 - K1) / 6 beta should be (K1 + K2) / 2

Return type

NewType()(image, ndarray)

rolling_ball_background_subtract(image, radius=100, kernel=None, nansafe=False)

Estimate background intensity by rolling/translating a kernel.

Return type

NewType()(image, ndarray)

sobel_edge_detection(image, orientation='both')

Applies Sobel filter

orientation can be ‘h’, ‘v’, or ‘both’

Return type

NewType()(image, ndarray)

unet_predict(image, weight_path, roi=2, batch=None, classes=3)

roi - the prediction values are returned only for the roi batch - number of frames passed to model. None is all of them. classes - number of output categories from the model (has to match weights)

Return type

NewType()(image, ndarray)

Return type
